text:
first pair summary statistics ’ll discuss consists mean standard deviation.mean variable \(y\)—denoted \(\bar{y}\) pronounced “y bar”—calculated summing values variable, dividing total number observations. formula form, \[

(Otherwise, number mean? 4200 pounds? Okay, probably , always mention units measurement.) Also notice rounded final value. gram small unit measurement, need report value many decimal places.use inline code, can say, “mean body mass group penguins 4201.754386 grams.” ways rounding number well, ’s bit hassle inline code.corresponding measure spread standard deviation. Usually called \(s\) calculated using much complicated formula:\[
s = \sqrt{\frac{\sum (y - \bar{y})^2}{n - 1}}.
\]measure spread \((y - \bar{y})\) term measures far away data point mean.R, calculated sd command. , ’ll need add na.rm = TRUE.“standard deviation group penguins 801 grams.”using inline code:“standard deviation group penguins 801.9545357 grams.”mean standard deviation always reported together. One without incomplete potentially misleading.Another related measurement variance, nothing standard deviation squared:\[

\](Compare formula one standard deviation. Nothing changed except removal square root.) rarely use variance introductory stats class ’s interpretable standard deviation. main reason units. data units grams, mean standard deviation also reported grams. variance units “grams squared”, even mean? need calculate variance R, command var.can check see number really just 801.9545357 squared.
